attributes.action: Stop any more migrants from taking away any more jobs from the construction industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British construction workers are struggling to find work in this industry because you have let so many migrates into our country, that are undercutting our rates, only to send the money from England back to their home. Lets take action!!!

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
